lang::UTFConverter Class Reference
[Language support library]

#include <UTFConverter.h>

Inheritance diagram for lang::UTFConverter:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Unicode UTF-data encoding/decoding helper class.

Supported encoding schemes are ASCII-7, UTF-8, UTF-16BE, UTF-16LE, UTF-32BE, UTF-32LE.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum lang::UTFConverter::EncodingType
 

Encoding/decoding scheme.

Enumeration values:
ENCODING_UNKNOWN  Unsupported/unknown encoding.
ENCODING_ASCII7  US/ASCII.
ENCODING_UTF8  UTF-8.
ENCODING_UTF16  UTF-16, platform endian.
ENCODING_UTF16BE  UTF-16 Big Endian.
ENCODING_UTF16LE  UTF-16 Little Endian.
ENCODING_UTF32  UTF-32, platform endian.
ENCODING_UTF32BE  UTF-32 Big Endian.
ENCODING_UTF32LE  UTF-32 Little Endian.

Creates an UTF-encoding converter with specified encoding.

Member Function Documentation

bool lang::UTFConverter::decode (  const void *  src,
const void *  srcend,
int *  srcbytes,
int *  dst
)  const [virtual]
 

Decodes bytes to single Unicode code point.

Ignores invalid input byte sequences.

Parameters:
src Ptr to the source data.
srcend Ptr to the end of source data.
srcbytes [out] Receives number of bytes decoded.
dst [out] Receives decoded Unicode code point (if byte sequence was not malformed).
Returns:
false if decoded byte sequence was malformed.

Implements lang::Converter.

bool lang::UTFConverter::encode (  void *  dst,
void *  dstend,
int *  dstbytes,
int  src
)  const [virtual]
 

Encodes single Unicode code point to bytes.

Parameters:
dst Destination buffer which receives encoded byte sequence.
dstend End of the destination buffer.
dstbytes [out] Receives number of bytes encoded.
src Unicode code point to encode.
Returns:
false if the code point couldn't be encoded.

Implements lang::Converter.
